thread.title_full: Universal Studios Hollywood Is Going To Raise Ticket Prices | Letty B | KISS 95.7

title: Universal Studios Hollywood Is Going To Raise Ticket Prices | Letty B | KISS 95.7
text:
Universal Studios Hollywood Is Going To Raise Ticket Prices posted by Letty B - A post shared by Universal Studios Hollywood (@unistudios) on Feb 23, 2017 at 11:00am PST 
Source: Instagram 
First Disneyland, now Universal Studios Hollywood! Disneyland announced last week that they would be raising prices on admission and now Universal is doing the same. Oh man! 
The daily ticket price at the gate will now be $120 instead of $115. The weekend prices also rose $5 per ticket as well. 
So, not too much, but it all adds up and the increase comes right before a rush of visitors hit the park for spring break. Universal Studios Hollywood is raising gate ticket prices https://t.co/oAUE3qvqiM pic.twitter.com/GmB74TbtXp â€” Los Angeles Times (@latimes) February 22, 2017 
Source: Twitter
